alert.note: Alert for Hillsborough (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 23 at 4:09PM EST until December 24 at 4:49AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in New Hampshire... Souhegan River At Milford affecting Hillsborough County. Soucook River Near Pembroke affecting Merrimack County. For the SOUHEGAN RIVER...including Milford, Merrimack...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Soucook River...including Pembroke...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Souhegan River at Milford. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 9.5 feet, Water begins to flood a portion of Route 101A in Milford. Water begins to flood the property of the Milford water utilities department, properties on Intervale Road in Wilton, and the Monadnock Water parking lot. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:45 PM EST Friday the stage was 9.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 3:45 PM EST Friday was 9.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this evening and continue falling to 6.1 feet early Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
